actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to repeal the recently enacted temporary extension of the existing earnings limitation under title II of the Social Security Act (limiting the amount of outside income which an individual aged less than 72 may earn while receiving benefits thereunder) so as to allow previously enacted provisions to take effect restricting the applicability of such limitation to persons aged less than 70.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981 which temporarily extend the outside income limitation for eligibility for title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) benefits under the Social Security Act to all persons under the age of 72.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the recently enacted temporary extension of the existing earnings limitation under title II of the Social Security Act (limiting the amount of outside income which an individual aged less than 72 may earn while receiving benefits thereunder) so as to allow previously enacted provisions to take effect restricting the applicability of such limitation to persons aged less than 70.
